findings.headline: MiMedx Celebrates 15 Year Anniversary of EPIFIX速 and AMNIOFIX速
findings.summary: MiMedx announced 15th anniversary of EPIFIX and AMNIOFIX placental allografts (published Feb 2, 2026)
findings.relevance: HIGH - Direct competitors to Clear Health Pass products
findings.action: Monitor for any promotional campaigns or market positioning changes

findings.headline: 2026 LCD Coverage Requirements
findings.summary: MiMedx documenting 2026 LCD changes requiring Level 1 clinical evidence (RCTs). EPIEFFECT positioned for coverage after RCT completion.
findings.relevance: HIGH - LCD changes affect entire wound care industry
findings.action: Review Clear Health Pass products' clinical evidence positioning

findings.headline: CYGNUS速 Dual Product Promotion
findings.summary: Organogenesis promoting CYGNUS速 Dual - dual-layered dehydrated human amniotic membrane with omni-directional application capability
findings.relevance: MEDIUM - Competing amniotic membrane product, streamlined application features
findings.action: Compare application methods and clinical advantages vs Clear Health Pass products

findings.headline: Organogenesis Principal Partner at 2026 SAWC Spring
findings.summary: Organogenesis is Principal Partner for WCCC Driving Innovation in Wound Care Summit at 2026 SAWC Spring | WHS
findings.relevance: MEDIUM - Major industry event sponsorship, high visibility
findings.action: Consider Clear Health Pass presence at SAWC Spring, networking opportunities

findings.headline: Smith+Nephew Leading Player with Grafix
findings.summary: Smith+Nephew identified as leading player (alongside Solventum). Grafix = cryopreserved placental membrane for acute/chronic wounds including exposed bone/tendon
findings.relevance: HIGH - Major competitor with strong market position and robust clinical evidence
findings.action: Review competitive positioning vs Grafix, clinical evidence comparison
